description: The iPhone Air is an incredible entry into the new iPhone line-up, featuring a featherweight design that packs a punch. The design is solid and you can trust the strength, while the display is stunning with a 120Hz refresh rate. The performance is Pro-grade with an A19 Pro chip under the hood, offering a truly breezy experience. The single camera sensor is capable, though it leaves much to be desired. The battery can last up to a day, but you can buy the iPhone Air MagSafe Battery to extend its life. At Rs. 119,900, the iPhone Air is a solid entry in the premium smartphone category.
title: iPhone Air Review: Thincredible

description: Apple is reportedly preparing a major Mac refresh for 2026, with the M5 chip powering new versions of the MacBook Pro, MacBook Air, Mac mini, and Mac Studio. According to AppleInsider, the first M5 MacBook Pro could launch by late 2025, while M5 Pro and M5 Max variants, along with refreshed desktop models, are expected in early to mid-2026.
title: Apple Reportedly Planning M5 MacBook Lineup, New Mac Mini and Studio for 2026

description: Game of Glory is a reality game show that is being hosted by Abhishek Malhan. The game will feature over 100 content creators battling to win the title of Ultimate Creator. This show will feature mental and physical challenges, where the battles will get complex as the levels proceed.
title: Game of Glory Is Streaming Now: Know All About This Abhishek Malhan-Hosted Game Show

description: Scientists have discovered a mysterious gravity signal detected by satellites nearly 20 years ago, which is linked to deep mantle changes beneath the Earth’s surface. The anomaly, lasting two years, coincided with a magnetic “jerk”, suggesting a rapid mass shift near the planet’s core.
title: NASA’s GRACE Satellites Reveal Hidden Deep-Earth Process Behind Gravity Disturbance

description: iQOO has confirmed that its upcoming iQOO 15 series, launching in China on October 20, will debut the in-house Q3 gaming chip. Paired with the QNSS super rendering engine, the chip promises console-like visuals, real-time ray tracing, and up to 144fps gameplay. iQOO claims performance gains of up to 60 percent and a 400 percent boost in AI compute.
title: iQOO 15 Unboxing Leaked Ahead of October 20 China Launch; Confirms Design and More

description: Amazon’s Great Indian Festival 2025 sale has entered its “Diwali Special” phase, continuing discounts on laptops, smartphones, and more from top brands. Shoppers can check the “Amazon Bestsellers” list for trending devices and use bank offers from Axis, IDFC First, Bobcard, RBL, and Amazon Pay ICICI to get up to 10 percent extra cashback on top of existing deals.
title: Amazon Diwali Sale 2025: Top Deals on Bestselling Laptops From Dell, HP and More

description: Google is reportedly planning to bring the always-on display (AOD) media controls to its Pixel Watch lineup, including the Pixel Watch 4, 3, and 2. The feature, missing from the recent Wear OS 6 update, is expected to arrive in the next quarterly Pixel Watch update later this year, possibly in December.
title: Google Is Reportedly Adding Always-On Display Media Controls to Pixel Watch 4

description: Anthropic has warned that even a few poisoned samples in a dataset can compromise an AI model. A joint study with the UK AI Security Institute found that as few as 250 malicious documents can implant backdoors in LLMs up to 13B parameters, proving model size offers no protection.
title: Anthropic Warns That Minimal Data Contamination Can ‘Poison’ Large AI Models

description: Honor has confirmed that the Magic 8 Pro will feature a 200MP telephoto camera with a 1/1.4-inch sensor, f/2.6 aperture, and CIPA 5.5-stop image stabilisation powered by the AIMAGE Honor Nox Engine. The series will launch on October 16 in China with Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 and MagicOS 10.
title: Honor Magic 8 Pro Confirmed to Get a 200-Megapixel Telephoto Camera and Advanced Image Stabilisation
